snippet.title: Teaser Satellite Odyssey: Prologue
snippet.description:
Discover Satellite Odyssey: Prologue – A Sci-Fi Adventure Coming to Steam August 30th

Satellite odyssey: Рrologue - is the opening part of the game series. It is a short first-person story-driven adventure with horror elements.
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of classic science fiction and retro futurism, inspired by Soviet sci-fi films and humanity's thirst for knowledge and the conquest of space.
